io.odysz.semantic.jsession

Class SSession

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • io.odysz.semantic.jsession.SSession
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISessionVerifier, Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(description="session manager",
            urlPatterns="/login.serv")
public class SSession
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements ISessionVerifier
    Handle login-obj: {a: "login/logout", uid: "user-id", pswd: "uid-cipher-by-pswd", iv: "session-iv"}
    and session-header: {uid: “user-id”, ssid: “session-id-plain/cipher”, sys: “module-id”}
    Session object are required when login successfully, and removed automatically. When removing, the SUser object is removed via session lisenter.
    Be careful with servlet session - created via getSessionId():
    https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2255814/can-i-turn-off-the-httpsession-in-web-xml
    Author:
    ody
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(io.odysz.semantic.DATranscxt daSctx,
                        javax.servlet.ServletContext ctx)
                 throws SAXException,
                        IOException,
                        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException,
                        SQLException
        Initialize semantext, schedule tasks, load root key from tomcat context.xml. To configure root key in tomcat, in context.xml, 
                <Context>
                <Parameter name="io.oz.root-key" value="*************" override="false"/>
        </Context></pre>
        Parameters:
        daSctx -
        ctx - context for loading context.xml/resource
        Throws:
        SAXException - something wrong with configuration files
        IOException - file accessing failed
        io.odysz.semantics.x.SemanticException - semantics error
        SQLException - database accessing error

      • stopScheduled

        public static void stopScheduled(int msDelay)
        Stop all threads that were scheduled by IrSession.
        Parameters:
        msDelay - delay in milliseconds.

      • verify

        public io.odysz.semantics.IUser verify(JHeader jHeader)
                                throws SsException,
                                       SQLException
        FIXME: This is a security breach. Client request can duplicated request with plain ssid and uid.
        Should we use a session key?
        Specified by:
        verify in interface ISessionVerifier
        Parameters:
        jHeader -
        Returns:
        JUser if succeed, which can be used for db logging - use this to load functions, etc.
        Throws:
        SsException - Session checking failed.
        SQLException - Reqest payload header.usrAct is null (TODO sure?)
